item.title: Generate diagrams with Asciidoctor and Hugo
item.description: Asciidoctor has good support for diagrams with the Asciidoctor Diagram plugin. To make this work with Hugo, a static site generator, you need a working asciidoctor-diagram plugin and some settings in your site config. Then run hugo --destination public to generate your site and diagrams. Have a look at my example repository to get an idea of how this works.
item.content:encoded:
Asciidoctor has good support for diagrams with the Asciidoctor Diagram plugin.

To make this work with Hugo, a static site generator, you need

  • a working asciidoctor-diagram plugin

  • and some settings in your site config.

Then run hugo --destination public to generate your site and diagrams.

Have a look at my example repository to get an idea of how this works.
